name: The Dark Tower (Nothing, Tucker Hux Murray, Kijo)
name_original: The Dark Tower (Nothing, Tucker Hux Murray, Kijo)
description:
The world will soon be consumed by the 50 years curse. You must conquer the dark tower in order to retrieve the book of sealing. Will you be able to take on the monsters lurking within? Controls (you can rebind though): MoveWASD ⬆️ ⬇️⬅️➡️CastLeft Mouse ButtonPause/Settings menuP Credits:
